for t in range(int(input())):
    n, s = [int(i) for i in input().split()]
    if (n == 1):
        print(s)
        continue

    if (s < 2):
        print(-1)
        continue

    if (n == 2):
        print(s - 1)
        continue

    l = [0 for i in range(n)]
    s -= 18
    l[0] = 9
    l[-1] = 9
    if (s <= 0):
        print(0)
        continue

    res = 1
    for i in range(n):
        temp = min(s, (9 - l[i]))
        l[i] += temp
        s -= temp
        res = res * l[i]
        i += 1
    print(res)
